org.apache.hama.ml.ann

Class NeuralNetworkTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hama.bsp.BSP<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,VectorWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,MLPMessage>
      • org.apache.hama.ml.ann.NeuralNetworkTrainer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BSPInterface<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,VectorWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,MLPMessage>

    public abstract class NeuralNetworkTrainer
extends BSP<org.apache.hadoop.io.LongWritable,VectorWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,org.apache.hadoop.io.NullWritable,MLPMessage>
    The trainer that is used to train the SmallLayeredNeuralNetwork with BSP. The trainer would read the training data and obtain the trained parameters of the model.
